meaningMnemonic: You hopefully have seen the word 注文 (order, request). This is just the verb version: <vocabulary>to order</vocabulary> / <vocabulary>to request</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: If you know the reading of 注文 you should be able to read this one too. Also, it's just all jukugo on'yomi readings, so you should be able to read it anyways.
